tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE evidence (
    evidence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
    evidence_text TEXT,
    date_added TIMESTAMP,
    lawyer_id UUID,
    child_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE evidence_text_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    sender_name VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_name VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_emails (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    subject VARCHAR(100),
    sender_email VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_email VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE text_messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_name VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_name VARCHAR(50),
    message_content TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_email VARCHAR(100),
    receiver_email VARCHAR(100),
    subject VARCHAR(255),
    body TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE child_custody_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(50),
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE text_messages (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sender VARCHAR(255),
   receiver VARCHAR(255),
   message_text TEXT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE emails (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sender VARCHAR(255),
   receiver VARCHAR(255),
   subject VARCHAR(255),
   body TEXT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE evidence_documents (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   document_title VARCHAR(255),
   document_text TEXT,
   category VARCHAR(100),
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE child_custody_case (
   case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   lawyer_name VARCHAR(255),
   child_name VARCHAR(255),
   case_status VARCHAR(50),
   hearing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE evidence_text_messages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    sender VARCHAR(255),
    receiver VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_emails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_subject TEXT,
    email_body TEXT,
    sender_email VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_email VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
